Extra-Curricular Code of Conduct and Guidelines

p.span:
Sonora ISD recognizes the complex challenge of empowering students to succeed in a world of rapid change and is committed to meeting the ever-changing demands of 21st-century education. We are a family, a community, a team; we dedicate ourselves and our resources to provide every child with every opportunity to become more tomorrow than can be imagined today.
​

div.div: Sonora ISD is actively monitoring the coronavirus situation. Please click here for information and updates.

a.title: 2020-21 Early Registration for PK and Kindergarten

div.a: 2020-21 Early Registration for PK and Kindergarten
div.div: Early registration for pre-k and kindergarten will begin the week of April 20th. Please read on for important information.
Please click here to read about the Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA).
